assessment_item.title: 11btu10q13-இரண்டாம் நிலை புறணி எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

இரண்டாம் நிலை புறணி எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?         

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ஃபெல்லோடெர்ம்                  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1083"},{"text":"

கார்க் கேம்பியம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1084"},{"text":"

ஃபெல்லோஜென்        

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1094"},{"text":"

 ஃபெல்லம்        

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1652"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"11btu10q13-இரண்டாம் நிலை புறணி எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?","title":"11btu10q13-இரண்டாம் நிலை புறணி எவ்வாறு அழைக்கப்படுகிறது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
